Name: Fusen
Description: Fusen is a widget‑first sticky note app. Create notes or checklists and pin them to your Home Screen. Toggle checklist items right from the widget, and make it yours with background colors, font color, family, size, and weight. Available in Small, Medium, and Large widget sizes.

Name: Remove Glare from Photo
Tagline: Remove glare from glasses and reflections instantly
Topics: Chrome Extensions, Design Tools, Marketing, Photography
Description: Quickly remove glare from photo with glare remover ai,Remove Glare from Photo is a Chrome extension that helps you eliminate glare from glasses, glass surfaces, and unwanted reflections in just a few clicks. Upload a photo and get a clean, natural-looking result without distracting highlights. Perfect for portraits, product shots, and social media images. Fast, simple, and browser-based — no complex editing skills required. remove glare from glasses and get rid of shine on face online.
